column4: really, I just want to know where I can get an intermediate package version! Can I grab the package from roughly July, 2010 somewhere?
i.e. does ubunut have a rolling repository somewhere? some sort of versioned repo?
I'll explain after someone just tells me the answer, it is easier that way
try searcing for the package at packages.ubuntu.com
which package are you looking for?
Sorry, your search gave no results
i think you can add the ppa to your sources and then use apt or synaptic
also, is it possible to pin the apt repository to a minor version of ubuntu 10.04?
it goes as archive.ubuntu.com/lucid for example
yeah, I was afraid of that
